body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Matthew Flores and the customer's name is Jane Hughes.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Matthew Flores, and I represent Phat Hogs, your go-to motorcycle dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Jane! How are you feeling today regarding your motorcycle options?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Honestly, I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed with all the choices.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand that it can be quite a lot to take in. Can I ask what specific type of motorcycle you are looking for?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m interested in a cruiser, something comfortable for long rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds fantastic! Cruisers are perfect for those long journeys. To assist you better, could I have your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane! And could you also provide me with your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! Thanks for that information. I will ensure to keep you updated on our latest cruiser arrivals.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Matthew! I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Jane! Thank you for your time today. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
